00040             function    set_up()
00041             {
00042                   $Settings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00043                   $this->CacheSwitch = $Settings->get_package_setting( 
00044                         'cache' , 'last' , 'cf_cache' , 'cache_switch' , 'off'
00045                   );
00046                   $Settings->set_package_setting( 'cache' , 'last' , 'cf_cache' , 'cache_switch' , 'on' );
00047                   
00048                   $Cache = get_package( 'cache' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00049                   $Cache->flush();
00050                   $Cache->reset();
00051             }

00063             function    tear_down()
00064             {
00065                   $Settings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00066                   $Settings->set_package_setting( 'cache' , 'last' , 'cf_cache' , 'cache_switch' , $this->CacheSwitch );
00067                   
00068                   $Cache = get_package_object( 'cache' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00069                   $Cache->drop_cache();
00070             }

00083             {
00084                   $CachedFS = get_package_object( 'cached_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00085                   $CachedFS->Cache->delete_data( './packages/index.html' );

00088                         $CachedFS->Cache->data_exists( './packages/index.html' ) === true )
